name: ait-saas-sso
description: AiT SaaS SSO Platform - Monorepo for infrastructure, database, and frontend applications

scripts.dev: echo 'Selecciona un workspace para iniciar: pnpm --filter <workspace> dev'
scripts.build: echo 'Selecciona un workspace para construir: pnpm --filter <workspace> build'
scripts.lint: echo 'Ejecuta lint en todos los workspaces con package.json'
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec -- rm -rf node_modules dist build .next out
scripts.update:idp-sdk: cd ./packages/idp-sdk && pnpm build && yalc publish && cd ../../apps/example && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .yalc && pnpm install && yalc add @ait-saas-sso/idp-sdk && pnpm install
